description.zh-cn: 台湾创作男歌手、词曲作者及音乐制作人。台湾青田音乐创始人，台南应用科技大学副教授兼系主任，也是英国牛津大学正念中心认证导师。他创作超过1000首歌曲，参与制作超过100张专辑。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer-songwriter, lyricist, and music producer. He is the founder of Green-Trend Music, an associate professor and department head at Tainan University of Technology, and a certified mindfulness teacher from the Oxford Mindfulness Centre. He has composed over 1,000 songs and produced over 100 albums.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台中市的市辖区，林隆璇的出生地。
description.en: A district of Taichung City, Taiwan, and the birthplace of Kevin Lin.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市文山区的公立综合大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Wenshan District, Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾男歌手，林隆璇的儿子。
description.en: Taiwanese male singer, son of Kevin Lin.

description.zh-cn: 世界主要宗教之一，由释迦牟尼创立的哲学和信仰体系。
description.en: One of the world's major religions, a philosophical and belief system founded by Siddhartha Gautama.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家唱片公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese record label.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家音乐制作及唱片公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese music production and record company.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家唱片公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese record label.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家音乐制作及唱片公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese music production and record company.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲一家大型娱乐集团。
description.en: A major entertainment group in Asia.

description.zh-cn: 环球音乐集团在台湾的分公司。
description.en: The Taiwanese branch of Universal Music Group.

description.zh-cn: 由林隆璇创立的台湾音乐经纪公司。
description.en: A Taiwanese music management company founded by Kevin Lin.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台南市永康区的私立科技大学。
description.en: A private university of technology in Yongkang District, Tainan, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国内政部所属机关，负责兵役及替代役等相关事务。
description.en: An agency of the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China, responsible for military conscription and alternative service affairs.

nodes.id: 替代役之歌－打造新世界

zh-cn: 替代役之歌－打造新世界
en: Song of Substitute Service - Creating a New World

description.zh-cn: 由中华民国内政部役政署发表的歌曲。
description.en: A song released by the National Conscription Agency of the Ministry of the Interior, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市中正区的艺文表演场所。
description.en: An arts and performance venue in Zhongzheng District, Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 林亭翰是林隆璇的儿子。
description.en: Lin Ting-han is the son of Kevin Lin.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇出生于台湾台中县丰原镇（今台中市丰原区）。
description.en: Kevin Lin was born in Fengyuan Township, Taichung County, Taiwan (now Fengyuan District, Taichung City).

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇毕业于政治大学，获得教育系博士学位。
description.en: Kevin Lin graduated from National Chengchi University with a PhD from the Department of Education.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇信仰佛教。
description.en: Kevin Lin is a Buddhist.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇于1986年至1987年期间为飞碟唱片公司旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin was an artist under UFO Records from 1986 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇于1988年至1990年期间为巨石音乐公司旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin was an artist under Rock Records from 1988 to 1990.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇在多个时期为福茂唱片公司旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin was an artist under Linfair Records during multiple periods.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇于2002年至2004年期间为阿尔发音乐公司旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin was an artist under Alfa Music from 2002 to 2004.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇于2009年至2012年期间为金牌大风公司旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin was an artist under Gold Typhoon from 2009 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇自2017年起为环球唱片（台湾）旗下歌手。
description.en: Kevin Lin has been an artist under Universal Music Taiwan since 2017.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇是台湾青田音乐的创始人。
description.en: Kevin Lin is the founder of Green-Trend Music in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇的经纪公司为他自己创立的青田音乐。
description.en: Kevin Lin's management company is Green-Trend Music, which he founded.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇在台南应用科技大学担任副教授兼系主任。
description.en: Kevin Lin serves as an Associate Professor and Department Head at Tainan University of Technology.

relationships.target: 替代役之歌－打造新世界

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇为《替代役之歌－打造新世界》作曲并演唱。
description.en: Kevin Lin composed and sang 'Song of Substitute Service - Creating a New World'.

relationships.target: 替代役之歌－打造新世界

description.zh-cn: 中华民国内政部役政署发表了歌曲《替代役之歌－打造新世界》。
description.en: The National Conscription Agency of the Ministry of the Interior, Republic of China, released the song 'Song of Substitute Service - Creating a New World'.

description.zh-cn: 林隆璇担任台北市中山堂“2021广场音乐节”的策展人。
description.en: Kevin Lin served as the curator for the '2021 Plaza Music Festival' at Zhongshan Hall in Taipei.
